articles.title: Post Office starting deliveries as soon as 6 a.m. - AL.com
articles.description: For the 2021 peak season – the period between Thanksgiving and New Year’s Day – some 850 million to 950 million holiday packages will be processed, transported and delivered.
articles.content:
Postal workers in Alabama will be out and about even earlier to keep up with holiday demand.
Letter carriers will begin rounds as early as 6 a.m. to ensure packages are being delivered on time, post… [+1127 chars]

articles.author: Michelle Toh, CNN Business
articles.title: SenseTime delays its IPO after being hit by another US blacklist - CNN
articles.description: SenseTime is postponing its big stock market debut after once again getting caught up in tensions between the United States and China.
